value.stringValue: Action High - Stop and contact Standby TL. Work should only continue if appropriate to do so with a risk mitigation action plan in place following discussion between Standby TL and Duty Manager. Please reassess in 1 hour.
Action Low - Continue working and reassess in 2 hours.
Action Medium - ﻿Pause to contact your Standby TL. You may be able to continue following discussion with your Standby TL and creating a risk mitigation action plan. Please reassess in 1 hour.

fields.name: error_message
fields.fieldText:
Error - working hours too long

You have said you are working {!hoursWorkedPotential} hours. 

Please ensure the number of hours worked is less than 36 hours or contact your Standby TL.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Action_Matrix
fields.fieldText:
⚠️ High risk

Stop and contact Standby TL.

Work should only continue if appropriate to do so with a risk mitigation action plan in place following discussion between Standby TL and Duty Manager.

Please reassess in 1 hour.

fields.name: Action_Matrix
fields.fieldText:
Low Risk

Continue working and reassess in 2 hours.

fields.name: Action_Matrix2
fields.fieldText:
Medium Risk

﻿Pause to contact your Standby TL.

You may be able to continue following discussion with your Standby TL and creating a risk mitigation action plan.

Please reassess in 1 hour.
